kevinswiber

  • Sat, Oct 23, 2021 - @taylor_atx Regional conferences often depend on sponsorship from local tech companies. This floods the conference with vendor talks and may homogenize it with the bulk of attendees being employed by sponsors.
  • Sat, Oct 23, 2021 - @taylor_atx This is a very thoughtful take. So, here‚Äôs my experience. For API Craft Conference 2013, we capped it at 150. We went all-in on an Open Space Technology approach. To this day, I hear from people about how it was the best experience. Transparent sponsors were a huge part of that.
  • Fri, Oct 15, 2021 - Do you think about debugging and observability when designing APIs? How do you effectively capture the application state within a consumer-producer interaction?
